      • close

        protected void close(boolean immune)
        Closes this inventory. (Dirty hack edition)
        Parameters:
        immune - if true, the parent of this GUI will be set immune when opened

      • onUpdate

        protected void onUpdate()
        Raised when the update() method is called. Use this method to update your internal data.

      • onAfterUpdate

        protected void onAfterUpdate()
        Raised when the update() method is called, but before the inventory is populated. Use this method in a Gui subclass to analyze given data and set other parameters accordingly.
